description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，籍贯山东掖县。担任辽宁五一八内燃机配件有限公司董事长兼总经理，并当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China with an ancestral home in Yexian, Shandong. He serves as the Chairman and General Manager of Liaoning 518 Internal Combustion Engine Parts Co., Ltd., and was elected as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 辽宁五一八内燃机配件有限公司

zh-cn: 辽宁五一八内燃机配件有限公司

description.zh-cn: 杨彬担任董事长和总经理的公司。
description.en: The company where Yang Bin serves as Chairman and General Manager.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杨彬的籍贯地，位于山东省。
description.en: Yang Bin's ancestral home, located in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.
The country of Yang Bin's nationality.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，杨彬作为全国人大代表所代表的地区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, which Yang Bin represents as a deputy to the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 杨彬是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yang Bin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 辽宁五一八内燃机配件有限公司

description.zh-cn: 杨彬担任辽宁五一八内燃机配件有限公司的董事长和总经理。
description.en: Yang Bin serves as the Chairman and General Manager of Liaoning 518 Internal Combustion Engine Parts Co., Ltd.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 杨彬作为辽宁地区代表，于2018年2月24日当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: Representing the Liaoning region, Yang Bin was elected as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress on February 24, 2018.
Yang Bin's ancestral home is Yexian.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会是全国人民代表大会的一个届次。
description.en: The 13th National People's Congress is a term of the National People's Congress.
